languages.text: "Передай приказ от моего лица — обеспечить сиротам подобающее содержание. Но личная встреча с Вольным Торговцем излишня".
"Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be properly provided for. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."
languages.original_text: "Передай приказ от моего лица — обеспечить сиротам подобающее содержание. Но личная встреча с Вольным Торговцем излишня".

traits.locale_text: "Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be provided with a proper upkeep. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."
"Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be provided with a proper upkeep. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."
"Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be properly provided for. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."
"Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be properly provided for. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."
"Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be properly provided for. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."

languages.text: “以我的名义传达命令，让看护人员妥善照顾那些孤儿。不过，要我亲自见他们一面，这恐怕就太过火了。”
languages.original_text: "Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be properly provided for. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."

traits.locale_text: “以我的名义传达命令，让看护人员妥善照顾那些孤儿。不过，要我亲自见他们一面，这恐怕就太过火了。”

languages.text: «Transmita esta orden en mi nombre: se debe cuidar debidamente a los huérfanos. Sin embargo, un encuentro personal con su Comerciante Independiente es mucho pedir».
languages.original_text: "Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be properly provided for. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."

traits.locale_text: «Transmita esta orden en mi nombre: se debe cuidar debidamente a los huérfanos. Sin embargo, un encuentro personal con su Comerciante Independiente es mucho pedir».

languages.text: 「この命令を{mf|俺|私}の代わりに伝えてくれ…孤児たちを適切に養ってやらなければならない。しかし、自由開拓者が個人的に会うのはやりすぎだ」
languages.original_text: "Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be properly provided for. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."

traits.locale_text: 「この命令を{mf|俺|私}の代わりに伝えてくれ…孤児たちを適切に養ってやらなければならない。しかし、自由開拓者が個人的に会うのはやりすぎだ」

languages.text: "Gebt folgenden Befehl in meinem Namen weiter: Für die Waisen ist angemessen zu sorgen. Aber ein persönliches Treffen mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} wäre zu viel."
languages.original_text: "Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be properly provided for. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."

traits.locale_text: "Gebt folgenden Befehl in meinem Namen weiter: Für die Waisen ist angemessen zu sorgen. Aber ein persönliches Treffen mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} wäre zu viel."

languages.text: « Transmettez cet ordre de ma part : que l'on subvienne à tous les besoins des orphelins. Cependant, je n'irai pas jusqu'à les rencontrer personnellement. »
languages.original_text: "Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be properly provided for. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."

traits.locale_text: « Transmettez cet ordre de ma part : que l'on subvienne à tous les besoins des orphelins. Cependant, je n'irai pas jusqu'à les rencontrer personnellement. »

languages.text: "Adıma bu buyruğu iletmeni istiyorum. Öksüzlerin her türlü ihtiyacı karşılanacak ancak Hür Tacir ile bizzat tanışmalarına gerek olduğunu düşünmüyorum."
languages.original_text: "Deliver this order on my behalf — the orphans are to be properly provided for. But a personal meeting with the Rogue Trader is too much."

traits.locale_text: "Adıma bu buyruğu iletmeni istiyorum. Öksüzlerin her türlü ihtiyacı karşılanacak ancak Hür Tacir ile bizzat tanışmalarına gerek olduğunu düşünmüyorum."
